website_summaries.verdict: A new take on almond butter. The perfect choice for anyone who enjoys complex flavor profiles.
pros: A whole new take on almond butter, with flavors like chocolate chilli, espresso nib, and garam masala
The ingredients are minimal and the butter is made 100% vegan
Works well on pretzels, crackers, or even by the spoonful
A fun addition to a burger as well
cons: Unique flavors may not appeal to everyone

customer_reviews.title: So disappointed
customer_reviews.text: $24 for literally 10 tablespoons, I bought this for a recipe and the jar looked half empty, I emptied the jar with 10 Tablespoons... as far as the flavor goes, it was alright, I will be making my own from here on. I figured for the price I would get an amazingly good product but I’m incredibly disappointed and will make my own from now on.
customer_reviews.author: Janice Tancredi

customer_reviews.title: Made us sick.
customer_reviews.text: This peanut butter made us SUPER sick, and we tossed it the day after trying it. Months later, I found out this was recalled because they found it was causing listeria. At least now I know why we got sick! No contact from the company regarding a refund. would not reccomend this brand or product to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: OkEmily

customer_reviews.title: Greasy oily and no flavor. But grease.
customer_reviews.text: So...tastes like super-greasy bland peanut butter with a hit of heat (with zero flavor) at the end. Nothing at all would make me think of Thai flavors in this at all. The jar is surprisingly small as well - think the very smallest jar of peanut butter on your grocery shelf. Complete waste of money. Get some fish sauce, some Sriracha, and a decently flavorful peanut butter and save yourself the time and money. This product actually made me mad it was so bad. And yes, I stirred it first.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Volkerts

customer_reviews.title: Spicy Thai Peanut Butter: recommended
customer_reviews.text: This is quite delicious and moderately spicy. The consistency is great--perfect for tongue, perfect for bread. The label says it will need stirring, but right now the oil is perfectly distributed, not sitting on top. Peanut butters that never need stirring are made with hydrogenated oils--good for stabilizing the texture, but not so good for the human heart. The crunchy pieces are smaller than in "extra crunchy" Skippy or Jif, a change I like. I think I’ve found my peanut butter. 11.2.18 addition Yesterday I added two tablespoons to a big pot (about 3 quarts ) of pumpkin soup. This added a lot of taste, a subtle bit of crunch, and also made it surprisingly hot.
customer_reviews.author: Green Eyes

customer_reviews.title: The best peanut butter I have ever had
customer_reviews.text: I know this peanut butter has a "hefty" price tag in comparison to other peanut butters on the market BUT... you really pay for a product that is unique and absolutely mind-blowing. The marriage of the peanuts with the espresso nibs give it a wonderful consistency and an addictive flavor. I have pretty much ordered one every month and I have tried other flavors (bought directly from the company) and they all have impressed me. This is the kind of peanut butter that you can not only eat straight out of the jar, but also use in recipes to give it that "something-something" that regular peanut butter would not give you.
customer_reviews.author: G. Murray

customer_reviews.title: Freaking Yum -
customer_reviews.text: I just love this stuff... There are so many things you can do with this besides the boring sandwich. I enjoy my adult peanut butter and jelly sandwiches. I also really like to use this to mix with my cook chicken and ground beef (beef, turkey, chicken - don't care). It instantly makes me feel like I am eating Thai Food. After this shipment, I purchased some shrimp, broccoli, and rice. I can't wait to start cooking. It is also good as a sauce for your ice cream. I look forward to doing my 3 ingredient oatmeal cookies (banana, oatmeal, and a little nut butter).
customer_reviews.author: Patrick

customer_reviews.title: This expresso - Peanut butter Is as thin as water dont Throw your money away
customer_reviews.text: 3/31/20 This is the most stranger jar of peanut butter I have Attempted to eat. It's literally like trying to eat Sandpaper. But the worst part about it, It's almost as thin like water and I missed it Thoroughly When I thought it was just a the top of the jar. I am so darn sorry I ever bought it. Yes, Come in a glass ja, What that does not Compensate for the consistency of The peanut butter Was extremely extremely thin Throughout the jar Don't believe The advertisement that is written. You'll be throwing your money away
customer_reviews.author: Carmen A.

customer_reviews.title: Heavily addicted! :)
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is the bomb! It is delicious! And nutritionally solid. I’ve been spreading the word to friends and family. It has a consistency and a flavor that can’t be beat! Just a fantastic product and an amazing find. I can’t get enough of it!
customer_reviews.author: JC Szot

customer_reviews.title: YASSS!
customer_reviews.text: This hazelnut spread is devine!! WOW is all I can say. Even my 7-yr old niece who only loves Nutella, got won over. They didn't skimp on the nuts in this spread and it's got the right amount of chocolate to balance the flavors. And KUDOS on the low carbs!! I'll definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald A Long

customer_reviews.title: Really good stuff!
customer_reviews.text: Espresso and honey chipotle: This flavor is pretty great! The main reason why I took a star off was because of the price, and it is not as addicting as tha spicy thai one. But other than that, I definitely would be purchasing more peanut butter from the company. It is an interesting flavor to add on sandwiches! Spicy thai: holy mother of god this is a masterpiece of peanut butter! I'm already on my second jar. Just buy it, dont question it, you wont regret it!
customer_reviews.author: Becca

customer_reviews.title: Healthy yet delectable.
customer_reviews.text: Can’t believe that something so delectable could be so healthy. Always craved Nutella as a kid and can’t quite find something healthy to compare. Saw this here in amazon while I’m looking for keto friendly snacks and all I can say is that I will buy more since it’s more delicious and healthy than nutella. Expensive but worth it in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding and Addicting!
customer_reviews.text: My wife got me a few of these "adult" peanut butters as a stocking stuffer for Christmas. I was really skeptical at first because I don't even eat peanut butter. However, the Honey Chipotle Peanut Butter is my new addiction. The slightly crunchy consistency and subtle spice are completely unique and totally delicious. My favorite way to eat it is actually to dip carrots, which makes it a really healthy snack as well. Love the minimal ingredients too. I have been ordering about a jar per week since the first one. The Garam Marsala is also very good, much more unique, but really good.
customer_reviews.author: mCg

customer_reviews.title: great
customer_reviews.text: Crack! This stuff is amazing. I bought to use in recipes but have found I also enjoy it on toasted sourdough bread.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela S Worrell

customer_reviews.title: Mmm good. Much like.
customer_reviews.text: Could have been packaged much better... Jars were only individually wrapped with one layer of bubble wrap. Jar broke inside the box and got all over my other jars. Not the fault of the peanut butter company! I had ordered two- one for me, one for my boyfriend- so I got into the other jar and it's amazing. Not overwhelmingly spicy. Will be great to mix into pad Thai!
customer_reviews.author: Olivia Geiger

customer_reviews.title: Seriously?
customer_reviews.text: Here's an idea, let's mix oily peanut butter with coffee grounds! And let's make sure the grounds are used and nasty. Then everyone will want to buy this as an eclectic, cool concoction. Seriously? I bought it thinking I'd try a nut butter that was more than the normal fare. But I made the mistake of buying this stuff. Tastes awful. Looks awful. And it truly is just oily peanut butter mixed with used and nasty coffee grounds. My bad. Threw it away after one taste.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Norris

customer_reviews.title: Low carb friendly
customer_reviews.text: I was excited to find this product and it’s delicious. I was hoping for a replacement for my 6 year old’s Nutella habit. This isn’t it but I’ll enjoy it myself. And I might be able slowly switch her. It is a peanut butter consistency and very separated. I’ll probably use the immersion blender to get it to the right consistency.
customer_reviews.author: Corry Jankowski

customer_reviews.title: Sticks and Twiggs
customer_reviews.text: I was so looking forward to this product. When I received it I found the product in big need of mixing to make everything a smooth consistency. Not a real big deal but wish it could have been better. The flavor was good with just the right amount of spice. My disappointment came when I found a small (what appears to be ) twigg in my sandwich. I'm a fairly forgiving guy but totally forgien things in my food...is a no no for me. What's even more disappointing was that I reached out to the manufacturer on their website to work through this situation and got NO RESPONSE! Shame on you! never will I buy your products again.
customer_reviews.author: Ric Spaulding

customer_reviews.title: OMGosh... the Hazelnut Chocolate is so GOOD!
customer_reviews.text: Please don't ever stop making the Eliot's Adult Nut Butters Spread, Oregon Hazelnut Chocolate!! It's sooooooooo GOOD! It reminds me of the ferrero rocher chocolate candy. YUM! I am so thankful that it only has 1 added sugar!! Ingredients are clean. Bottle came full and it's a nice large size. Not small like most special nut butters. It might be spendy but it's worth it and you get your money's worth. And it came packed safely in it's own special box in a box. I'll be back for more!
customer_reviews.author: Our Family

customer_reviews.title: Yummy
customer_reviews.text: This Peanut Butter is to die for. My favorite. It is a touch spicy and I just love it. Very little sugar as I dont like alot of added sugar in food, and just a touch of chocolate. Try it you will love it.
customer_reviews.author: vstevens

customer_reviews.title: Excellent flavor, but too salty
customer_reviews.text: I really like the great idea of having real coffee bean crunches in the peanut butter. It gives the peanut butter a great additional flavor that is well balanced. My problem with this products that it is too salty for my taste. I wish it were less salty so one would enjoy it better right out of the jar. I will not buy the product again because of its saltiness, despite the fact that I really like the idea of mixing coffee with peanut butter, and I have to say that they nailed it.
customer_reviews.author: AK

customer_reviews.title: Justins chocolate nut butter
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is great - I use it instead of frosting and my family is none the wiser. A thin spread, delicious and maybe a tiny bit more healthy than frosting... try it! Works great on brownies... best to "drizzle" (put some in a sandwich bag and cut the tip - squeeze out) onto cupcakes or other more tender baked goods.
customer_reviews.author: ForeverYOUNGTop Contributor: Baking

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: LOVE THIS STUFF! I've actually tried all of their flavors and they are all great! Buy this!
customer_reviews.author: Kyle K.

customer_reviews.title: Great Texture
customer_reviews.text: Though not as much espresso flavor as I had anticipated, I did enjoy this peanut butter. It tastes like a a saltier type of peanut butter with a hint of espresso. My favorite thing about it is the crunch. The espresso beans give a more intense crunch than peanuts can give alone. If I were to buy again, it would be for the texture more than the flavor.
customer_reviews.author: Riley

customer_reviews.title: Tasty
customer_reviews.text: It is a tasty mix of spices and nut butter. Only issue I have is that sometimes small bits of spices or other things are too hard against teeth. If you do buy this, you probably should be signed up on producers website for any info regarding product as amazonn won't inform you in a timely manner.
customer_reviews.author: Victor E

customer_reviews.title: ITEM RECALLED
customer_reviews.text: There was a recall on this item, but I can't find any info regarding that fact. UPC#51586 00600
customer_reviews.author: savvy saver

customer_reviews.title: Awesome! I want to hug the inventor of this flavor!
customer_reviews.text: This is ridiculously delicious!! I tried the spicey one through keto krate and then saw the espresso nib one! It is my new go to breakfast! I dip low sugar chocolate bar in and after a few scrumptious bites I am ready for a keto day!!
customer_reviews.author: JBtw

customer_reviews.title: This is a superb Peanut butter.
customer_reviews.text: This product is the most unique peanut butter that i ever had, you can warm it with noodles, or as I love it as peanut butter and jelly with Stonewall's Garlic and Onion jam on San Francisco Sourdough toast and it is so delicious and unique and blends well. I want to purchase this separately, I don't care if it is more expensive it is worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Heather Paul

customer_reviews.title: Yum yum
customer_reviews.text: I was hoping it was sweet. It isn’t, but it’s nice and crunchy. I like to add a little brown sugar and butter with it on toast. Will try the other flavors in the future. Make sure you stir it up before using
customer_reviews.author: Cat Lover

customer_reviews.title: Love. This. Stuff.
customer_reviews.text: All three of the original peanut butter flavors are awesome and have become staples in my pantry. The Spicy Thai flavor has a somewhat strong lime flavor to it, so it may be the one that is hit or miss with most people that have tried it at my house, but I love it. One of the greatest victories of my life is that, after holding my local Central Market for months, this stuff finally hit the shelves where I can go buy it even more often. Very few ingredients and great taste. Perfect.
customer_reviews.author: mCg

customer_reviews.title: Addictive
customer_reviews.text: A little salty, a little sweet, completely addictive! I don’t know how I lived without this spread. My only complaint is the jar empties too fast. Need to offer a 28oz jar or similar size for us super fans. Great stuff!
customer_reviews.author: Fan of None

customer_reviews.title: 4 stars
customer_reviews.text: It's good but not great. It tastes more "healthy" compared to other chocolate hazelnut spreads. There is also 24 servings in this container so it might seem low in calorie according to nutrition facts but most people are going to use more than 1 serving size of this. I like it but I wouldn't purchase it often because I would use a lot of it and I need to watch my calorie intake. Also because the taste is a 4 not a 5.
customer_reviews.author: Miss Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Yummy
customer_reviews.text: This brand makes magic with nuts and turns them into butter that we eat it right off the spoon.
customer_reviews.author: $HP

customer_reviews.title: Flavor missing
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the espresso nib. It has no flavor. Imagine something thick and crunchy with no flavor. The dog likes it though.
customer_reviews.author: MyDogKobe

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t get better than this
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t get better than this. Great product quality and value for the money My 3 favorites. Cocoa nips ...and rich peanut butter. expresso beans. Great product for sharing
customer_reviews.author: larryjayrubin

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely delicious
customer_reviews.text: This really is the best tasting peanut butter I've ever had. There are so many recipes you can try with it. It is natural peanut butter, so it will require some stirring. But it's worth it. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Michael E.

customer_reviews.title: Spicy PB&J is great
customer_reviews.text: Goes really well with jelly. When I first got it, I tried it straight. I love spicy food. I love peanut butter. This was spicy, but not great. At first, I wasn't sure I was going to like it. Then I put it on a sandwich with some normal jelly. Something about that combo is great. You really should try it.
customer_reviews.author: Brandonc123

customer_reviews.title: Not the taste I remember
customer_reviews.text: I tried this peanut butter years ago from a monthly subscription box and loved it. This jar however had a strange taste. It’s was no where near expired but it had an odd flavor that was not enjoyable. Maybe I just got a jar from a bad batch.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Yummy!
customer_reviews.text: Like. Double like. Love entirely! It's delicious. It's got a little kick, a little sweet, and lots of texture. I keep buying it over and over again.
customer_reviews.author: kriddle

customer_reviews.title: Holy almond butter!!! So good!
customer_reviews.text: This is da spicy yummy chocolate goodness bomb!!! The brownie recipe on the jar is a must... Put on apple slices....thank me later!! For sure buying this late night snack needs again!!
customer_reviews.author: Secret Squirrel

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Flavor...Perfect Gift for the Foodie in your Life!
customer_reviews.text: I love Eliot’s Adult Nut Butters... is hard to choose a favorite. The Nut butters are long on flavors and short on ingredients. I really appreciate knowing what all the ingredients are. These Nut butters are delicious on their own. It’s also fun to substitute these Nut butters in recipes that call for plain peanut butter.
customer_reviews.author: Bethany Beem

customer_reviews.title: Delicious nut spread
customer_reviews.text: This spread is amazing, it tastes like Ferrero Rocher. It's not overly sweet and simply delicious, specially over warm toasted bread. It's not cheap but it doesn't have an endless list of additives and it's only made with a few ingredients. Unfortunately the delivery was delayed (so it's been my latest 3 Amazon orders), now I understand that's not necessarily a manufacturer problem, but if I buy a product that clearly states it will be delivered in 2 days and it's not, that is dissapointing and someone should be taking responsability for it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Kunde

customer_reviews.title: Interesting peanut butter
customer_reviews.text: I'm new to the whole unique flavored peanut butter craze. This sounded really good but it just wasn't a flavor that I was interested in after tying it. I can tell that the base peanut butter is phenomenal, however the bitter espresso and cacao nibs was a little too much for me. It wasn't very flavorful in my smoothie but it could be interesting in a baked good. Also, super pricey.
customer_reviews.author: KO

customer_reviews.title: Chipotle
customer_reviews.text: The lemongrass is too overpowering. There is nothing spicy about this peanut butter. The chipotle honey is better
customer_reviews.author: D. Leaym

customer_reviews.title: Espresso flavor not detected
customer_reviews.text: The jar arrived covered in oil. The texture is good but the flavor is bland, could not taste any espresso flavor. Not what I expected given the high price
customer_reviews.author: juliemarier@yahoo.com

customer_reviews.title: Peanutbutter is great but the added nibs, eh?
customer_reviews.text: Very underwhelming. I'm not sure what I was expecting but this is not it. Peanutbutter it's self, rich and full peanut flavor. The nibs and coffee bits add a crunch, however really unable to distinguish their flavors. Just a bit expensive to be so underwhelming.
customer_reviews.author: Claudia

customer_reviews.title: No returns policy and how to contact the seller
customer_reviews.text: This is the second time I ordered. The first time was fine. The second time, it arrived covered in oil from inside the bottle. There was no returns policy and still trying to work out how to contact the seller
customer_reviews.author: Potatocat

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for making Thai sauces!
customer_reviews.text: It is a little spicy but I’m admittedly a wimp. I used this to make a Pad Thai sauce. It was so good. Great mix of flavors with a pop of spice.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen

customer_reviews.title: really tastes like quality peanuts
customer_reviews.text: the slight spicy and lime-fresh taste adds a lot. i re-ordered immediately (if you donT have to be thrifty).
customer_reviews.author: Carrie Sheridan

customer_reviews.title: Really great with rice
customer_reviews.text: This nut butter was bought to make an almost forgotten dinner. Chicken green bean 1/2 jar of Eliot's nut butter grilled chicken 1/3 can of coconut milk... serve with rice...great meal no left overs the next day. I love this product and even own Stock in the company that bought them but kept the creator as president (VRUS) stock symbol VERUS INTERNATIONAL INC COM.
customer_reviews.author: wd_artist

customer_reviews.title: The best.
customer_reviews.text: This is seriously the best peanut butter I’ve ever tasted. Not only are the ingredients so natural but mixed with the espresso the flavors are devine! I’ve already bought 4 jars, I simply cannot stop eating it.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Haug

customer_reviews.title: Expensive but Tasty
customer_reviews.text: I love this nut butter flavor, it's my favorite of all of all the Eliot's Nut Butters collection. It has a small spicy kick, but it collaborates well with the peanut and lime flavor profiles. It is crunchy and delicious; however, it is pricey at over $11 a jar with tax. End result: Amazing flavor, not the best "bang for your buck".
customer_reviews.author: Caleb Harman

customer_reviews.title: Good flavor but I didn’t really like the consistency
customer_reviews.text: My husband loved it. I bought this one for him for Christmas along with one other flavors. I just wasn’t a fan of the texture. I love chunky peanut butter but the mixture of the espresso nibs In the peanut butter give me the sensation of biting down on an eggshell.
customer_reviews.author: ashley becker

customer_reviews.title: Out of this World Taste
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product that came so well and carefully packed and secured. I opened the jar and dipped my finger in it unable to wait while looking for a spoon..It is absolutely divine, the best peanut butter with a kick. I had it with some toast, a spoonful over fruit and today I made some soba noodles with a dash of hot pepper, few drops of vinegar and 2 spoonfuls of this peanut butter. Hurrying to order some more of those exotic goodies. Well done Elliott's.
customer_reviews.author: Helena Mesic

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love the flavor of this peanut butter! Works perfectly with Thai food or you can eat it straight out of the jar. It's spicy but not too spicy, very flavorful. Sooo yum!
customer_reviews.author: MSN

customer_reviews.title: Must buy!
customer_reviews.text: This is SO good. Tasty, low carb, less calories than your standard peanut butter. Love the espresso in it.
customer_reviews.author: t10e

customer_reviews.title: Skip it.
customer_reviews.text: Awful. Imagine adding gravel to your peanut butter. There is no coffee flavor. You get the sense while eating this that you chipped a tooth. I don't know what I was expecting, but I certainly did not expect it to be this unpleasant.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Delicious
customer_reviews.text: I love this nut butter! I never tried chipotle in peanut butter and it is delicious!
customer_reviews.author: Christy Young

customer_reviews.title: Tasty, not overly sweet, does not separate. Great!
customer_reviews.text: I loved it so much! Chocolate that’s actually good for you! Yum! Definitely getting again! And again!
customer_reviews.author: Emma Furman

customer_reviews.title: Wanted to love it but, it tasted rancid right off the bat.
customer_reviews.text: This product looked so promising and delicious, but it was not fresh and had a distinctly rancid taste. Ended up tossing it :(
customer_reviews.author: Felicia Ferrance

customer_reviews.title: Best peanut butter ever!
customer_reviews.text: Lately the jars have leaked oil when they’re delivered. Besides being slightly messy, the peanut butter has dry lumps and is harder to stir. I wanted to share this with the manufacturer so they could correct the problem. I just don’t see that option.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie Logan

customer_reviews.title: I’d eat this every day for breakfast!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love the rich robust flavor! Great source of protein and very satisfying! I bought some for my son in-law and he loves it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Daeji

customer_reviews.title: Safe and secure packaging and amazing taste!
customer_reviews.text: I had some hesitation in buying this glass jar online, due to poor previous customer experiences with breakage or leakage. I have to say I’m happy the jar came in a really safe and secure box. The peanut butter itself is some of the best tasting I’ve ever experienced!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not sweet, but salty
customer_reviews.text: Was looking for a coco hazelnut spread that was not super sweet...this is not super sweet, but it seems a bit too salty. I will get again due to not being sweet and no artificial sweeteners. But, wish it were not quite so salty
customer_reviews.author: BitoMom

customer_reviews.title: Fails at the most basic test..it's not peanut butter!
customer_reviews.text: This separates into a solid and liquid in the jar. No matter how much I tried mixing it, I couldn't get this to become peanut butter. It remains a bunch of nuts and other solids swimming in a pool of oil. The flavor is fine, but how am I supposed to spread this on anything? This isn't peanut butter, it's peanuts swimming in a pool of oil.
customer_reviews.author: valiant

customer_reviews.title: It's good but it's not a substitute for Nutella
customer_reviews.text: This is healthy and tastes pretty good. It is chunky and very thin, it will spread in a very thin layer on a surface. So, if you are looking for a substitute for Nutella, keep looking. I will enjoy my jar but not try to use it as I would Nutella.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Gish

customer_reviews.title: Thai spicy peanut butter-great for sauces.
customer_reviews.text: Love this! I add it to Thai inspired dishes. I also add it to soups. It is delicious!
customer_reviews.author: Cherylann11

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely Delicious!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is absolutely delicious! Great on sandwiches, or just put it on a spoon and enjoy. I've also added this to Asian style soups and stir fry to great effect. Don't wait, taste it now!
customer_reviews.author: Barbara

customer_reviews.title: Great product but production problems
customer_reviews.text: This peanut butter is great and I’ve bought it for years. The last one however had huge chunks of spices that were not mixed in properly. I had to pay a lot to have it shipped and ended up throwing a lot of it out.
customer_reviews.author: H2014

customer_reviews.title: Wasted money
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t like it at all. Terrible taste butdid not return it. After 2 years product was recalled due to Listeria content. I stil had it but Amazon would not issue a refund because it was past the return time window. Fair? I don’t think so.
customer_reviews.author: Jefferson Davis

customer_reviews.title: Bold flavor
customer_reviews.text: We have been using this product for over a year. We love it. Just wish the size was bigger. We use to purchase off the shelf in a larger size for about the same price as this one. Since it is not available at any of our local markets, we will continue to buy here.
customer_reviews.author: Molly & Mitchell Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Addicted!
customer_reviews.text: Just TOO YUMMY! The delicate hint of cayenne is Perfect! I'm Hooked! Finished the entire jar in 2 days! Bought another one. Also lasted 2 days!
customer_reviews.author: Dawn Aleta Drawdy

customer_reviews.title: NOT A WINNER!
customer_reviews.text: THIS IS NOT AN ETHNIC DELIGHT; NOR AN EXCCLLENT FOOD CHOICE. ITS GARLIC IS INAPPROPRIATE; ITS NUTS ARE POORLY SELECTED AND NOT KIDS' CUISINE.. A P00R SELECTION FOR DISCOVER CUSTOMER CUSTOMERS. .
customer_reviews.author: FRS

customer_reviews.title: No big deal
customer_reviews.text: Its peanut butter with brown sugar and little tasteless things that stick in your teeth.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Hartmann

customer_reviews.title: Taste was bleh.  Could've been better
customer_reviews.text: Taste was bleh. Could've been better. Definitely wanted to like this. The taste was really bland, even for a nut butter. I ended up putting it in the fridge and just adding it to my shakes.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Really like the flavor. Could grind coffee a little more.
customer_reviews.author: Marcy

customer_reviews.title: Rocks
customer_reviews.text: First time I tried it I almost broke a tooth, found a grey pebble in the peanut butter. Since then it has been sitting in my fridge, not sure what I am going to do with it.
customer_reviews.author: B. P. Harris

customer_reviews.title: I enjoyed it but it is too pricey for me to ...
customer_reviews.text: I enjoyed it but it is too pricey for me to reorder. Between the cost of the item and the shipping it was ridiculous for a jar of peanut butter with crunched up espresso beans
customer_reviews.author: gerricapa

customer_reviews.title: Very unique, coffee and peanut butter
customer_reviews.text: this is a tasty adult treat. I don’t think it’s something I could eat jar after jar. But definitely taste good for an occasional treat... Adult taste buds only as the coffee flavor is very strong and overpowers the peanut butter.
customer_reviews.author: Savannah

customer_reviews.title: A bit pricey but worth it.
customer_reviews.text: Where has this been all my life?!?! Got this package in a timely manner and tried a bit the night I got it. It is so delicious and tasty. Theproduct is a bit runny when you first initially open it so it would be perfect to mix into oatmeal . It is a bit pricey but I believe its worth it due to taste and how clean the ingredients is. No preservates or palm oil. Worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Better for cooking?
customer_reviews.text: Probably would be best for cooking. I bought this for having a snack. Grabbing a spoonful now and then. Taste is good with subtle coffee notes. But honestly its a bit hard to chew. which takes away from the overall experience. I would love to try cooking with it.
customer_reviews.author: mitchell

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.text: This was absolutely awful. I purchased this as a gift and I would never buy again. I was expecting something great and this was the exact opposite. There was no flavor whatsoever and it was more like an oil than a butter. This was the consistency of soup and just had layers of oil. It was an embarrassment try with the person. After it was open, the container leaked oil and made a mess everywhere. Please do not waste your money on this
customer_reviews.author: hm

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing - not nice flavor or texture
customer_reviews.text: Disappointing - flavors aren't really integrated and it ends up being unpleasant. The texture is a gritty - not like chunky PB which is great but almost sandy at times
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Kondratowicz

customer_reviews.title: Too hot to handle
customer_reviews.text: Too much cayenne pepper to suit me. I can barley taste the other spices . Otherwise it seems a good quality peanut butter . won't reorder
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: WOW!
customer_reviews.text: WOW! This is so amazingly delicious and spectacularly interesting! I love lemongrass and this blows me away! I am going to send this to all kinds of people because it's that splendid!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: We are delighted !
customer_reviews.text: Great for my faux pad thai sauce as it is already spicy.
customer_reviews.author: BA Benton

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money
customer_reviews.text: Was the same consistency as Italian salad dressing. We tried and failed to stir it into any sort of semblance of peanut butter, it was disgusting.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Droid Pants

customer_reviews.title: Tastes OK, but I probably won't re-order
customer_reviews.text: I was hoping for a vegan version of Nutella, but this isn't it. It's not bad, but I didn't find myself craving it. I probably won't be re-ordering.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Fancy up your PB
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my sister who loves coffee! She said it was great and used it to make PB carb-free cookies!
customer_reviews.author: BMiller

customer_reviews.title: UNEXPECTED TASTE
customer_reviews.text: its not awful or gross, but the "nibs" taste like chia seeds..I honestly think they are Chia seeds and not espresso nibs. Its not a bad flavor but not the flavor I paid and expected.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Easter

customer_reviews.title: Poor taste and texture.
customer_reviews.text: The pallet is off-putting. A scent of nut butter on the nose. Feels like chewing dirt.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Heat not sweet!
customer_reviews.text: It has a nice burn at the end, I love it. It’s not sweet so if you’re a conventional store bought JIF or skippy person it’s probably not for you. I add a little honey to it on English muffins, great simply made product.
customer_reviews.author: Cory S.

customer_reviews.title: I got the spicy Thai and wow is it good! Now I can enjoy satay without all the ...
customer_reviews.text: I got the spicy Thai and wow is it good! Now I can enjoy satay without all the added sugar!
customer_reviews.author: tonyterner

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Product! Better Version of Nutella
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a healthier version of Nutella, this is exactly what I was looking for! Lower sugar and natural, simple ingredients. It tastes great too! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed overall
customer_reviews.text: The flavor just didn’t do it for me. I expect a specialty item like this to be really yummy. I would have liked more Thai flavor. I thought it was just kind of flat. I did appreciate the healthful ingredients.
customer_reviews.author: Marcia Parker

customer_reviews.title: Great quality great flavors
customer_reviews.text: This is the best adult peanut butter you'll find hands down.! Very tasty!!
customer_reviews.author: Judy L. Fabio

customer_reviews.title: Delicious
customer_reviews.text: Tasted this at the holiday craft fair in SF and liked them so much ordered them from Amazon. Very interesting flavors - will use them as a dip with crackers/vegetables and probably in some other dishes that require nut flavors (like Thai dishes calling for peanut sauces).
customer_reviews.author: cyssf

customer_reviews.title: Delicious
customer_reviews.text: Tasted this at the holiday craft fair in SF and liked them so much ordered them from Amazon. Very interesting flavors - will use them as a dip with crackers/vegetables and probably in some other dishes that require nut flavors (like Thai dishes calling for peanut sauces).
customer_reviews.author: cyssf

customer_reviews.title: DELICIOUS!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE, LOVE, LOVE this product! Hope the production can keep up with my demand. LOL.
customer_reviews.author: LeAnn Raymond

customer_reviews.title: Not my favorite
customer_reviews.text: Bought this honestly because it looked interesting. It’s very thin , I’m going to try it in a cookie recipe? Might be ok
customer_reviews.author: robin r fox

customer_reviews.title: Salty
customer_reviews.text: Very, very, very, salty. It is more solid than peanut butter, hard to spread. I do t recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: granwhiz

product_meta.title: Eliot's Nut Butters Spread, Classic Salted Peanut Butter, Non-GMO, Gluten Free, Keto and Paleo Friendly, 12 Ounce
product_meta.description: Flavor Name:Classic Salted Peanut ButterThe beauty is in the simplicity of classic peanut butter with just ingredients. Being ground in small batches with just peanuts and salt, we let the peanuts shine and leaves with some of the best PB around.
feature_bullets: No added oils, preservatives or stabilizers
Small batch production filled with lots of TLC

specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
